statements: UPDATE user_permissions SET can_view = true, can_download = true, can_delete = false WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_permissions SET can_delete = true, can_view = false, can_download = true WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_permissions SET can_view = true, can_download = false WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_permissions SET can_download = true, can_delete = true, can_view = false WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET username='john.doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE image_data SET image_url='http://newurl.com/image.jpg', image_name='New Image' WHERE image_id=2;
UPDATE users SET password='newPassword123' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE image_data SET image_name='NewImageName', image_url='https://example.com/newimage.jpg' WHERE image_id=5 AND user_id=3;
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE images SET upload_date = '2022-01-30 15:30:00' WHERE image_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE images SET upload_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE image_id = 5;
UPDATE UserPermissions SET can_view = TRUE WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE RolePermissions SET can_edit = TRUE WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
UPDATE UserPermissions SET can_view = TRUE, can_edit = FALSE WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ImageData SET image_url = '/images/new_image.png' WHERE image_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE image_data SET image_name = 'new_image_name' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE image_data SET image_name = 'new_image_name', image_data = 'new_image_data' WHERE image_id = 100;
